Service Details: - Provides adaptive programs and services throughout the Okanagan Valley and surrounding areas- Dedicated to the inclusion and equality of children, youth, and adults who have a physical or sensory disability- Offers programs and services including Powder Hounds Adaptive Ski program, Okanagan Thunderchair Power Wheelchair Soccer Team, Wheelchair Basketball, Adaptive Curling, Kids in Motion program, Adaptive Equipment Loan Cupboard, Transportation Program
Cost: Annual membership of $10 provides total program access
Address & Map: 1720 Ethel St, #23Kelowna, BC     V1Y 2Y7View MapQuest Map
